title: Economic and Financial Inclusion in 2011: What it Means for Americans and our Economic Recovery
content: - 12 -  we all have a stake.  One of the positive commitments that can emerge from this period of   terrible economic distress is the determination that all Americans, regardless of income,   have access to reasonably priced financial products and services so that they may fully   participate in our nation’s economy and safely build assets for their futures.     Thank you.
